Html:
I am having some issues using the route i am trying to route between to key word for example
Melbourne, Australia to St Kilda, Australia

here it the code i am using any help will be great
 Private Sub Button1_Click(sender As Object, e As EventArgs) Handles Button1.Click
        Dim startpos As String = SLocationTXT.Text
        Dim endpos As String = LocationTXT.Text
        Dim NewRoute As GMap.NET.WindowsForms.GMapOverlay
        Dim Route As MapRoute = GMapProviders.OpenStreetOsm.GetRouteBetweenPoints(startpos, endpos, False, False, 5)

        NewRoute = New GMap.NET.WindowsForms.GMapOverlay(GMapControl1, "New Route")

        GMapControl1.Overlays.Add(NewRoute)


        Dim p As GMap.NET.WindowsForms.GMapRoute

        p = New GMapRoute(Route.Points, "New Route")
        NewRoute.Routes.Add(p)

        GMapControl1.ZoomAndCenterRoute(Route)
    End Sub
    I can use the long an lat but in need to use addresses 

Private Sub Button1_Click(sender As Object, e As EventArgs) Handles Button1.Click
        Dim startpos = New PointLatLng(-25.974134, 32.593042)
        'SLocationTXT.Text
        Dim endpos = New PointLatLng(-25.959048, 32.592827)
        Dim NewRoute As GMap.NET.WindowsForms.GMapOverlay
        Dim Route As MapRoute = GMapProviders.OpenStreetMap.GetRouteBetweenPoints(startpos, endpos, False, False, 15)

        NewRoute = New GMap.NET.WindowsForms.GMapOverlay(GMapControl1, "My Route")

        GMapControl1.Overlays.Add(NewRoute)


        Dim p As GMap.NET.WindowsForms.GMapRoute

        p = New GMapRoute(Route.Points, "New Route")
        NewRoute.Routes.Add(p)

        GMapControl1.ZoomAndCenterRoute(Route)
    End Sub
i worked it out i was using 2 different map Providers 
Private Sub Button1_Click(sender As Object, e As EventArgs) Handles Button1.Click

        Dim startpos As String = SLocationTXT.Text
        Dim endpos As String = LocationTXT.Text
        Dim NewRoute As GMap.NET.WindowsForms.GMapOverlay
        Dim Route As MapRoute = GMapProviders.GoogleMap.GetRouteBetweenPoints(startpos, endpos, False, False, 15)

        NewRoute = New GMap.NET.WindowsForms.GMapOverlay(GMapControl1, "My Route")

        GMapControl1.Overlays.Add(NewRoute)


        Dim p As GMap.NET.WindowsForms.GMapRoute

        p = New GMapRoute(Route.Points, "New Route")
        NewRoute.Routes.Add(p)

        GMapControl1.ZoomAndCenterRoute(Route)
    End Sub
